member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE
member.summary: Specifies a new attribute value for a topology node.

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.NodeId
member.summary: The identifier of the topology node to update. To get the identifier of a topology node, call .

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.guidAttributeKey
member.summary: GUID that specifies the attribute to update.

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.attrType
member.summary: Attribute type, specified as a member of the enumeration.

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.u32
member.summary: Attribute value (unsigned 32-bit integer). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_UINT32.

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.u64
member.summary: Attribute value (unsigned 32-bit integer). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_UINT64. See Remarks.

member.name: MFTOPONODE_ATTRIBUTE_UPDATE.d
member.summary: Attribute value (floating point). This member is used when attrType equals MF_ATTRIBUTE_DOUBLE.
